title: Prompt
body:
$ list
bin/
dev/
usr/
> 
<<enable Dialogue shiftleft>>
<<enable Dialogue shiftright>>
-> DEBUG <<if $debug is true>>
   [[DEBUG]]
-> changedir bin
   [[Bin]]
-> changedir dev
   [[Dev]]
-> changedir usr
   [[Usr]]

title: Qux
body:
<<start DoomClock 30>>

Ooooh, Qux

...there's something you 
should know about qux...

Hope you can get out!

[[./qux|Qux]]
[[./quxit|Quxit]]

title: Dev
body:
$ list
led.exe
>
-> run led.exe 0 0 <<if $computer_led_1 is true>>
    <<set $computer_led_1 to false>>
    LED0 state: disabled
    [[Dev]]
-> run led.exe 0 1 <<if $computer_led_1 is false>>
    <<set $computer_led_1 to true>>
    LED0 state: enabled
    [[Dev]]
-> run led.exe 1 0 <<if $computer_led_2 is true>>
    <<set $computer_led_2 to false>>
    LED1 state: disabled
    [[Dev]]
-> run led.exe 1 1 <<if $computer_led_2 is false>>
    <<set $computer_led_2 to true>>
    LED1 state: enabled
    [[Dev]]
-> run led.exe 2 0 <<if $computer_led_3 is true>>
    <<set $computer_led_3 to false>>
    LED2 state: disabled
    [[Dev]]
-> run led.exe 2 1 <<if $computer_led_3 is false>>
   <<set $computer_led_3 to true>>
    LED2 state: enabled
   [[Dev]]
-> changedir ..
   [[Prompt]]

title: Hack1
body:
<<setpuzzle Dialogue intro>>
Enter password:
0x[$puzzle_target]
0x[$puzzle_active]
>
-> COMMANDS
    [[Hack1]]
-> ABORT
    <<clearpuzzle Dialogue>>
    [[Usr.Root]]
-> SUCCESS
    [[Hack1.Success]]
-> FAILURE
    [[Hack1.Failure]]

title: Usr.Root
body:
$ list
passwords.txt.enc
>
-> run hack passwords.txt.enc <<if $path_set is 1>>
    [[Hack1]]
-> open passwords.txt.enc
    --- BEGIN ENCRYPTED DATA ---
    CE C0 95 C5 F8 25 B0 24 38 A3 
    58 5E DA 89 3E EF 9D 8B 1B 44
    EF 2A AD F1 94 E9 FE 82 29 F8
    F0 8B A2 DF 5B F0
    --- END ENCRYPTED DATA ---
    [[Usr.Root]]
-> changedir ..
    [[Usr]]

title: Pokemans
body:
Pokemans.exe
============

Must identify and catalogue
every Pokeman!

<<set $visited_pokemans to 1>>
[[Usr.Guest]]

title: Usr.Guest
body:
$ list
pokemans.exe
<<if $hacked_pokemans is 1>>
pokemans.hacked.exe
<<endif>>
>
-> run pokemans.exe
    [[Pokemans]]
-> run hack pokemans.exe <<if $path_set is 1 and $visited_pokemans is 1 and $hacked_pokemans is 0>>
    <<set $hacked_pokemans to 1>>
    [[Usr.Guest]]
-> run pokemans.hacked.exe <<if $hacked_pokemans is 1>>
    [[Pokemans.Hacked]]
-> changedir ..
   [[Usr]]

title: Bin
body:
$ list 
qux.exe
hack.exe
>
-> run qux.exe
    [[Qux]]
-> run hack.ee
    Nothing to hack! 
    <<if $path_set is 0>>hack command is missing from $PATH!<<endif>>
    <<if $path_set is 1>>Try running from other locations.<<endif>>
    <<set $show_path_set to 1>>
    [[Bin]]
-> update PATH /bin/hack <<if $path_set is 0 and $show_path_set is 1>>
    Done.
    <<set $path_set to 1>>
    [[Bin]]
-> changedir ..
    [[Prompt]]

title: DEBUG
body:
-> Toggle Debug State Display
   <<toggle DebugTextView>>
   [[DEBUG]]
-> Set bitmask state
   <<set $path_set to 1>>
   <<set $visited_pokemans to 1>>
   <<set $hacked_pokemans to 1>>
   [[Usr.Root]]
-> Back
   [[Prompt]]
